args.natural_language_statement: Every path connected and locally simply connected topological space X has a universal covering space \tilde{X} \to X.

retrieved_examples.nl: If G is a finite group then G has a composition series.
retrieved_examples.lean: theorem exists_composition_series (G : Type*) [Group G] [Fintype G] : ∃ (H : List (Subgroup G)), IsCompositionSeries H := by sorry

retrieved_examples.nl: Every compact Hausdorff space is normal.
retrieved_examples.lean: theorem compact_t2_is_normal (X : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X] [CompactSpace X] [T2Space X] : NormalSpace X := by sorry

retrieved_examples.nl: Any connected, locally path-connected and semi-locally simply connected space has a universal cover.
retrieved_examples.lean:
axiom PathConnected (X : Type*) : Prop
axiom LocallyPathConnected (X : Type*) : Prop
axiom SemiLocallySimplyConnected (X : Type*) : Prop
axiom CoveringMap {X Y : Type*} (f : X -> Y) : Prop
axiom UniversalCover {X Y : Type*} (f : X -> Y) : Prop

theorem exists_universal_cover (X : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X] (h1 : PathConnected X) (h2 : LocallyPathConnected X) (h3 : SemiLocallySimplyConnected X) :
  ∃ (X̃ : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X̃] (p : X̃ -> X), CoveringMap (p) ∧ UniversalCover (p) := by sorry

import Mathlib
open Bundle

/-- Every path connected and locally simply connected topological space X has a universal covering space \tilde{X} \to X. -/
theorem exists_universal_cover_extracted [TopologicalSpace X] [PathConnectedSpace X]
 [LocallyPathConnectedSpace X] [LocallySimplyConnectedSpace X] : ∃ X₀ x, Nonempty (IsUniversalCover X₀ x) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Every path connected and locally simply connected topological space X has a universal covering space. -/
axiom PathConnected (X : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X] : Prop
axiom LocallySimplyConnected (X : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X] : Prop
axiom CoveringMap {X Y : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y] (p : X -> Y) : Prop
axiom IsUniversalCover {X Y : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y] (p : X -> Y) : Prop

theorem exists_universal_cover (X : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X]
  (h1 : PathConnected X) (h2 : LocallySimplyConnected X) :
  ∃ (X̃ : Type*) (tX̃ : TopologicalSpace X̃) (p : X̃ -> X), CoveringMap (p) ∧ IsUniversalCover (p) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Every path connected and locally simply connected topological space X has a universal covering space. -/
axiom PathConnected (X : Type*) : Prop
axiom LocallySimplyConnected (X : Type*) : Prop
axiom CoveringMap {X Y : Type*} (Xtop : TopologicalSpace X) (Ytop : TopologicalSpace Y) (p : X -> Y) : Prop
axiom IsUniversalCover {X Y : Type*} (Xtop : TopologicalSpace X) (Ytop : TopologicalSpace Y) (p : X -> Y) : Prop

theorem exists_universal_cover (X : Type*) (Xtop : TopologicalSpace X)
  (h1 : PathConnected X) (h2 : LocallySimplyConnected X) :
  ∃ (Xtil : Type*) (XtilTop : TopologicalSpace Xtil) (p : Xtil -> X),
    CoveringMap XtilTop Xtop p ∧ IsUniversalCover XtilTop Xtop p := by sorry
